column1: #text=I wanted to get a book on gardening , so I went to the library .
#text=I was n't sure where the gardening books were , so I went to the electronic card catalog and looked gardening up .
#text=I found the Dewey Decimal number and then went down the rows of shelves until I got to the right number .
#text=I have a small yard , so I thought a book on container gardening would be best .
#text=I chose one with lots of pictures .
#text=I then took the book to the circulation desk and waited in line behind a mother with a child .
#text=The child had about twenty picture books .
#text=I gave the librarian my library card and book and she scanned them both in a laser reader .
#text=Then she handed me my book and a receipt .
#text=Looks like I have three weeks to learn how to garden !
